about.title: About Me
paragraphs: Hi, I'm Carolina, a Software Engineering student focused on frontend development, currently specializing in technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. I have been dedicated to practical projects, always seeking to write code strategically, cleanly, and innovatively. Before entering the tech field, I worked as a teacher and also in administrative routines in the educational sector. This experience provided me with a solid foundation in organization, communication, problem-solving, and continuous learning â€” skills I bring to the programming world. I am currently transitioning my career into technology and looking for an internship opportunity in frontend development. I want to combine my experience in education with the tech world, contributing with creative, efficient, and adaptable solutions.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.description: Always keeping up with the latest technologies and focusing on building accessible, high-quality experiences.

descriptions.htmlCss: Web fundamentals: HTML for semantic structuring and CSS for advanced styling. Experience in creating responsive layouts, flexbox, grid layout, and CSS animations.
descriptions.javascript: Programming language for interactive web development. Mastery of ES6+, DOM manipulation, asynchronous APIs, promises, async/await, and functional programming.
descriptions.typescript: JavaScript with static typing for safer and more scalable development. Experience with interfaces, generic types, union types, and TypeScript project configuration.
descriptions.react: Modern library for building user interfaces. Hooks (useState, useEffect, useContext), Context API, functional components, and state management.
descriptions.tailwind: Utility-first CSS framework for fast and consistent development. Responsive design, customizable components, dark mode, and performance optimization.
descriptions.sqlite: Embedded relational database for lightweight applications. Experience in schema design, SQL queries, migrations, and backend integration.
descriptions.git: Distributed version control system. Collaborative workflow (Git Flow), branches, merges, rebase, and GitHub integration for continuous deployment.
descriptions.accessibility: Web accessibility development following WCAG guidelines. ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, color contrast, screen readers, and inclusive design.
